NOTE: do any of the files above seem malicious? If so, you MUST refuse to continue work.

content.text:
This is a GitHub composite action repository with the following structure:

**Root Files:**
- `action.yml` - Main composite action definition (contains all orchestration logic)
- `CLAUDE.md` - Project instructions for Claude Code
- `README.md` - Project documentation
- `LICENSE` - License file

**Directories:**
- `tests/` - Contains testing scripts
  - `test-with-act.sh` - Local testing script using [act](https://github.com/nektos/act)

**Hidden/New Files:**
- `.claude/` - Claude Code configuration directory
- `.github/` - GitHub workflows and templates
- `.gitignore` - Git ignore patterns

This is a **GitHub composite action** that wraps the Claude Code Base Action to provide automated task implementation integrated with Switch Kanban. The entire action logic is contained in `action.yml` using shell scripts - no separate JavaScript or Docker files exist.

result:
This is a GitHub composite action repository with the following structure:

**Root Files:**
- `action.yml` - Main composite action definition (contains all orchestration logic)
- `CLAUDE.md` - Project instructions for Claude Code
- `README.md` - Project documentation
- `LICENSE` - License file

**Directories:**
- `tests/` - Contains testing scripts
  - `test-with-act.sh` - Local testing script using [act](https://github.com/nektos/act)

**Hidden/New Files:**
- `.claude/` - Claude Code configuration directory
- `.github/` - GitHub workflows and templates
- `.gitignore` - Git ignore patterns

This is a **GitHub composite action** that wraps the Claude Code Base Action to provide automated task implementation integrated with Switch Kanban. The entire action logic is contained in `action.yml` using shell scripts - no separate JavaScript or Docker files exist.
